Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Player.java Represents a player that currently holds a highscore in the game.
    Author:
    Blake Ambrose (z3373623)
    See Also:
